Question: Shenzhen Premier Exhibition Services Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Premier Exhibition Services Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlights

- Creality showcased flagship 3D printers, emphasizing speed, precision, and versatility
- K1C: Features a speed of 600mm/s, enhanced extrusion system, AI camera, air filter, and all-metal extruder for carbon fiber printing
- Ender-3 V3 series: Introduces CoreXZ structure for swift motion components, precise Z-axis, and 4.3-inch capacitive touchscreen
- CR-10 SE: Boasts automatic first-layer leveling, high-speed printing, and support for various filaments
- Ecosystem gems: Creality Falcon2 (40W/22W) laser engravers and CR-Scan Ferret Pro 3D scanner
- Commitment to democratize creation and make 3D printing accessible to a global audience
- Overseas Sales Director, William WU, emphasized a visionary outlook and commitment to lead the global consumer-level 3D printing ecosystem
